mapper.select: SELECT b.id, b.uid, b.content, b.title, b.category_id, b.publish, b.cdt, c.name as category, u.username as uname, u.avatar FROM ii_blogs b INNER JOIN ii_categories c ON b.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN ii_users u ON b.uid = u.id WHERE b.id = #{id}

SELECT b.id, b.uid, b.content, b.title, b.publish, b.cdt, c.name AS category, u.username AS uname, u.avatar FROM ii_blogs b INNER JOIN ii_categories c ON b.category_id = c.id INNER JOIN ii_users u ON b.uid = u.id LEFT JOIN ii_bookmarks bm ON b.id = bm.blog_id WHERE u.username = #{uname} ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT #{page.limit} OFFSET #{page.offset}
